question: In which of the following states, state's first e-budget was presented at the legislative Assembly?
explanation: Assam Finance Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma presented state's first e-Budget at the legislative Assembly. Each legislator of Assam State Legislative Assembly was provided with a tablet (computer) having details of the Budget. During the discussions in the house, the legislators were able to access the details through this tablet. In order to truly make it an E-Budget, the reporters covering the state budget were given a pen drive containing the details. Besides, Assam State Budget 2018-19 has also been made available on Google app.
